title.rendered: Dr George Mowatt | Technical Director (Expert Witness)

content.rendered:
With a Degree in Naval Architecture and a PhD in Strength of Ship Structural Elements George’s extensive experience covers both ship and offshore structures (fixed, floating, compliant and MODU), design, construction and installation. He has led major Offshore North Sea Project EPIC teams in the role of Project Manager and Project Director. This followed by his appointment as Operations Director and subsequently MD of Earl & Wright, a well-respected international Platform design and procurement company.  Subsequently, George was appointed as CEO and MD of significant design and procurement companies, including Kvaerner Engineering (UK) and Saipem Energy.

George, since 2002, has been Adjusting’s Technical Director and since 2005, has led the company’s involvement in Litigation and Dispute Resolution. In this role he has undertaken numerous Expert Witness assignments covering LOF Salvage claims, groundings and stability issues, and offshore platform design, construction and operation disputes. His experience is global covering Europe, North America, Middle East and Asia Pacific Regions.

Discipline: Naval Architecture BSC. Structural Engineering PhD. C.Eng.
Specialism: International operations; Class and Statutory Requirements; Design Defects; Design – Ship Design; Offshore platform Design and Construction; Subsea Structure; Fatigue Assessment; Finite Element Analysis; Loadout Analysis; Transportation & Installation; Heavy Lift; Risk Assessment; Contract / Construction Dispute; Stability; Subsea Structure; Vessel Structural Strength; Collision & Grounding; Expert Evidence, Arbitration & Litigation Support.

Contact

London | +44 (0) 7836 278 238

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine & Offshore Engineering Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We provide marine & offshore engineering services in the major marine energy centers around the world. Our engineers have a good understanding of the local regulatory requirements, the available industry infrastructure and the culture they operate in.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Warranty Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The AqualisBraemar teams of Marine Warranty Surveyors, Engineers and Master Mariners act to protect Underwriters’ interests or self-insured Clients. We provide independent third party review and approval of offshore projects.
